rows.col_2: Customer Acquisition Cost - total ad spend / new customers
Lifetime Value - total revenue from a customer over time
Marketing Efficiency Ratio - total revenue / total ad spend
Return on Ad Spend - revenue / ad spend (per campaign)
Average Order Value - revenue / number of orders
Certificate of Analysis - lab test for product batch
Minimum Order Quantity - smallest order supplier accepts

rows.GLOSSARY: NOTE: See 'Grand Unifying Dictionary' tab for comprehensive term definitions
This tab covers industry/technical terms. GUD covers operational/process terms.
